entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 2:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
